00159 typedef enum {
00160     /* Don't call request again until new SETUP                              */
00161     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_DONE = 0,
00162     /* STALL the control endpoint                                            */
00163     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_STALL,
00164     /* Send a 0 length IN packet                                             */
00165     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_SEND_ACK,
00166     /* Prepare to receive 0 length OUT packet                                */
00167     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_GET_ACK,
00168     /* Notify handler when IN data has been transmitted                      */
00169     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_DATA_IN,
00170     /* Notify handler when OUT data has been received                        */
00171     CSL_CDC_REQUEST_DATA_OUT
00172 } CSL_CdcRequestRet;
00173 
00177 typedef enum {
00179     CSL_CDC_MEDIACCESS_OVERFLOW,
00181     CSL_CDC_MEDIACCESS_SUCCESS,
00183     CSL_CDC_MEDIACCESS_NOTPRESENT,
00185     CSL_CDC_MEDIACCESS_WRITEPROTECT,
00187     CSL_CDC_MEDIACCESS_BADMEDIA
00188 } CSL_CdcMediaStatus;
